com.theBombSquad.stratego.gameMechanics

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.theBombSquad.stratego.gameMechanics.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
    The gameView acts as the communication interface between players/renderers and the game. Each user of the view can assume he is PLAYER_1: The view takes care of all necessary translations between the player space and the game space.
